ugtitle: Under graduate programme B.Tech (4 year, full time) in the following branches :

ug.title: Computer Science and Engineering
ug.description: The Department offers B.Tech course in Computer Scinece and Engineering(4 year, full time). Affiliated to APJ Abdul Kalam University.

ug.title: Electronics & Communications Engineering
ug.description: The Department offers B.Tech course in Electronics and communication Engineering.. Intake is 60 + 6 lateral entires per year.

ug.title: Information Technology
ug.description: The Department offers B.Tech in Information Technology (4 year, full time). Affiliated to APJ Abdul Kalam University (intake: 63 plus 6 as Lateral entry in the third semester).

ug.title: Mechanical Engineering
ug.description: The Department offers B.Tech course in Mechanical Engineering(4 year, full time). Affiliated to APJ Abdul Kalam University.

ug.title: Electrical and Electronics Engineering
ug.description: The Department offers B.Tech course in Electrical and Electronics Engineering(4 year, full time). Affiliated to APJ Abdul Kalam University.

ug.title: Civil Engineering
ug.description: The Department offers B.Tech course in Civil Engineering(4 year, full time). Affiliated to APJ Abdul Kalam University.

pgtitle: Post Graduate programme M.Tech Computer science (2 year , full time) :

pg.title: Computer Science and Engineering
pg.description: The Department offers M.Tech course in Computational Linguistics(2 year, full time). Affiliated to APJ Abdul Kalam University.

pg.title: Mechanical Engineering
pg.description: The Department offers M.Tech course in Robotics(2 year, full time). Affiliated to APJ Abdul Kalam University.
